properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 2:31PM PST until February 5 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Active Winter Weather Returns to the Area...

.A Pacific storm system will bring snow to all elevations of the
region beginning Tuesday evening and continuing into Wednesday
before snow levels rise during the afternoon and evening.

* WHAT...Snow expected for The Cascade Crest including Highway 2
between Coles Corner and Stevens Pass. Total snow accumulations
of 5 to 15 inches with highest amounts near the Cascade crest.

* WHERE...Mazama, Stehekin, Stevens Pass, Plain, and Holden
Village.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on the
Highway 2 approach to Stevens Pass.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY FOR THE CASCADE CREST INCLUDING HIGHWAY 2 BETWEEN COLES CORNER AND STEVENS PASS
